directions: Heat a large pot over medium-high heat. Cook and stir beef and sausage in the hot skillet until browned and crumbly, 7 to 10 minutes; drain and discard grease.
Stir corn, kidney beans, and chili seasoning mix into the beef and sausage. Reduce heat to medium-low and cook at a simmer until hot, 20 to 30 minutes.
ingredients: 2 (15.25 ounce) cans whole kernel corn, drained
2 (15 ounce) cans kidney beans, rinsed and drained
title: Simply Quick Chili
